question: every day they bring some prasad and give to me to eat
answer:
QUESTION
Assalamalikum mufti shab I stay in India. I am a Government employee here in our office 80% of majority is non muslim. every day they bring some prasad and give to me to eat. Is it allow to eat that or plz tell me how to ignore that prasad
ANSWER


Share:

Assalamu Alaikum Warahmatullah

 

Brother/Sister in Islam

 

I do not now what is Prasad.

 

If you are not sure about the ingredients of the Prasad you may diplomatically refuse it. If your non-Muslim colleagues will be disappointed, you may take it and give it to another poor Hindu person

 

And Allah Knows Best

 

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
